name: AutoDLC
tagline: Automatic Dynamic Lightbox Carousel. Upload your photos to a folder. Insert 1 Div. Link the JS & CSS and Done.
body:
![ScreenShot](http://sandbox.revitalagency.com/autoDLC/autoDLC-screenshot.jpg) ># [DEMO](http://sandbox.revitalagency.com/autoDLC/) *** ## Why autoDLC 1. Quick Setup 2. CSS REsizing not JS 3. Dynamic HTML Build from File List 4. Responsive Popup(Lightbox) Gallery Carousel 5. Total CSS Control, cool mag icon slide in on hover. 6. Preloading optional ## Quick Setup in the .JS thumbFolder = "tns/"; photosFolder = "photos/"; magnifierImg = "images/zoom-in.png"; prevArrow = ""; nextArrow = ""; ## Upload your Files Thumbnails and Large Photos must be named the same. ## Easy Placement Place this div where you want the thumbnails to be. CSS will resize the thumb containers automatically. `
` ## Link CSS/JS Files You know the drill. Link the files in the <head>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
